metadata.description: cc10x v3.0 - Intelligent AI orchestration for systematic development

plugins.name: cc10x
plugins.description: cc10x v3.0: Intelligent orchestration system with 12 agents + 21 progressive skills. Auto-loaded CLAUDE.md orchestrator detects intent, assesses complexity, routes workflows dynamically. 5-agent parallel review (security, quality, performance, UX, accessibility). Progressive loading (50-75% token savings). Complexity gate (warns when manual better). 'What Could Go Wrong' methodology. Workflows: REVIEW (always worth it), PLANNING (complexity 4-5), BUILDING (TDD with pause points), DEBUGGING (LOG FIRST).
